title: i cant see my replays
body: hey riot today my account got suspended for 14 days, but im not here to complain about that and accept the punishment for my actions. im just enquiring about not being able to see replays in my match history and im guessing it has something to do about being banned. is there any way im able to retrieve them before the replays expire? thanking you (Y)

replies.body: Someone on your friends list can download them from your profile (as long as its ranked)

the game was a norm, damn. I'm only really fussed on this particular game because I killed the 67th ranked OCE chally twice in lane and wanted to save it in my archive as one of my proudest moments zzzz
